overview_of_class: In this project-based course, students gain an understanding of how to build a modern full-stack web application using the MEAN framework (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS and Node.js). Students also learn how to deploy their web applications to both Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure, the two largest cloud hosting providers. Finally how the npm package manager and third-party and open source modules can extend their web applications will be covered. Collaboration is paramount to a successful product, website and/or mobile application. However, students will be responsible for completing their own project/web application and submitting independent assignments.
name: Topics in Information Systems:
subject: CIS
